mapper.update: update alg_r_user_data_call_trans set data_sn = #{dataSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_usr_sn = #{callUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_usr_sn = #{ownerUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, call_pay_amount = #{callPayAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where umc_sn = #{umcSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select umc_sn, data_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time, duration, call_pay_amount, creat_time from alg_r_user_data_call_trans where umc_sn = #{umcSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select umc_sn, data_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time, duration, call_pay_amount, creat_time from alg_r_user_data_call_trans

select umc_sn, data_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time , duration, call_pay_amount, creat_time from alg_r_user_data_call_trans where creat_time=(select max(creat_time) from alg_r_user_data_call_trans where data_sn=#{dataSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and call_usr_sn= #{callUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and owner_usr_sn=#{ownerUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and data_sn=#{dataSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and call_usr_sn= #{callUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and owner_usr_sn=#{ownerUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
